Use recycled paper or digital invitations: Instead of traditional paper invitations, consider using recycled paper or opt for digital invitations to reduce paper waste.
Choose eco-friendly decorations: Look for decorations made from sustainable materials such as bamboo, hemp, or recycled paper.
Select locally-sourced food and drinks: Choose food and drinks that are locally sourced and organic to reduce the carbon footprint of transportation.
Use biodegradable or reusable products: Instead of single-use items such as plastic cups or utensils, opt for biodegradable or reusable alternatives.
Choose a green venue: Look for a wedding venue that is already eco-friendly or has sustainable practices in place, such as energy-efficient lighting or composting programs.
